text:
Janine Turner (born Janine Loraine Gauntt; December 6, 1962) is an American movie and television actress. She starred in the television drama "Northern Exposure" (which started in 1990 and ended in 1995) and in the movies "Steel Magnolias" and "Cliffhanger". She was born in Lincoln, Nebraska.
Awards and nominations.
Emmy Award
Golden Globe Award
Screen Actors Guild Awards
Young Artist Award
